name: Signature-Grand-Suite-Charles-Pierre-Suite
caption: Charles Pierre Suite
alt:
The Signature Grand Suites are luxurious and sophisticated two-bedroom offering views of Manhattan’s prestigious Upper East Side.  

An entry foyer complements the regal living / dining room. A comfortable sofa, two side tables, coffee table, two exquisitely upholstered arm chairs, and two ottomans adorn the suites.  A dining table that seats four to six guests, an executive desk with chair, a wall mounted 40” TV hangs over the vanity fireplace with console and mini bar forms part of the suite. The suite is complemented by a well-appointed pantry kitchen for private gatherings.

The suites comprise of two bedrooms – the master bedroom features a plush and comfortable king bed, chaise, two night stands, an arm chair with side table and Bose Wave studio radio  featuring Bluetooth connectivity and alarm clock.

The second bedroom comprises of twin beds, one night stands between the two beds and console with a 40” TV. Four fixture Turkish marble clad bathrooms features a pedestal sink, glass enclosed shower, bathtub, plush bathrobes and towels and luxurious Etro amenities.
